titles.title: Behold, Where in a Mortal Form

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Behold, where in a mortal form Appears each grace divine! The virtues, all in Jesus met, With mildest radiance shine.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To spread the rays of heavenly light, To give the mourner joy, To preach glad tidings to the poor, Was His divine employ.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In the last hours of deep distress, Before His Father's throne, With soul resigned He bowed, and said, "Thy will, not mine, be done!"{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Be Christ our Pattern and our Guide! His image may we bear! O may we tread His holy steps, His joys and glory share!{/lang-eng}
